rules_text:
Trample
When Endangered Rhino dies, create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]As the last rhino fell, the realm was left with only memories and idols carved in its likeness.[/i]
